Event.name: Entrance Hall
Event.description: A group of goblins attacks you at the entrance. You need to overcome this situation.

Event.name: Poison Mist Room
Event.description: The room is filled with an eerie green mist... You feel your throat tightening.

Event.name: Magic Book
Event.description: You have found an ancient magic book. Perhaps the old sage might know something about it...

Event.name: Mysterious Stranger
Event.description: You encounter a mysterious stranger in the room. The old sage seems to have valuable information.

NPC.name: Old Sage
NPC.dialog: Welcome, traveler. The path ahead is treacherous, but knowledge is power.

Event.name: Old Sage's Warning
Event.description: The Old Sage strokes his beard thoughtfully.

NPC.name: Old Sage
NPC.dialog: Beware of the green mist ahead. Many adventurers have fallen to its poison...

Event.name: Old Sage's Advice
Event.description: The Old Sage reaches into his robes.

NPC.name: Old Sage
NPC.dialog: Take this herb. It might help you against the poison. And remember, sometimes retreat is the wisest choice.

Event.name: Ghostly Banquet
Event.description: The empty plates suddenly start shaking. You pass by the ghostly banquet and continue on your way.
